backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining SurgeryCase CRUD with access control, notes support, and sorted listing using an in‑memory Map.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old case records to include a new notes field initialized to an empty string.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files to features adding and propagating the notes field.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries of major frontend files describing case pages, forms, utilities, and notes-field additions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root configuring routing, authentication gating, theming, and login UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout and clearing React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty placeholder file for a profile setup modal component.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Reusable case form component including demographics, checklist fields, and a notes textarea with create/edit support.
frontend/src/components/cases/QuickAddDe: Component for parsing demographics from text or OCR, allowing edits and applying parsed values to a case.
frontend/src/components/cases/ToDoSectio: Renders and manages case to-do items with add, toggle, and delete actions via React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main page layout with top navigation, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Displays the top navigation bar with app branding, user identity, and login button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting cases and to-do items.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetailPage.tsx: Displays and edits a specific case, handling updates, deletion, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CaseListPage.tsx: Lists all cases with search, sorting, CSV/JSON import, and export features.
frontend/src/pages/NewCasePage.tsx: Provides a form to create a new surgery case and submit it to the backend.
frontend/src/utils/caseMatching.ts: Finds the most recent case matching an MRN by sorting on arrivalDate and id.
frontend/src/utils/dateTime.ts: Utility functions for converting between bigint timestamps, dates, and HTML date strings.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsParser.ts: Parses free‑text demographic info into structured fields, tracking missing and uncertain values.
frontend/src/utils/ocrText.ts: Extracts text from images using the browser TextDetector API with fallback error handling.
Parses CSV rows into SurgeryCase objects with validation for enums, booleans, dates, and todos.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending requests related to adding a notes field to surgery cases.
